questions.question_text: Which of the following are true for reports in ServiceNow? (Choose three.)

choices.D: Can be run on demand by authorized users.
choices.C: All users can generate reports on any table.
choices.A: Any user can see any report shared with them.
choices.E: Can be scheduled to be run and distributed by email.
choices.B: Can be a graphical representation of data.

discussion.content:
Valid is BDE
A is invalid because an user cannot see a shared report if has no access to a report's table(s)
E is valid: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/rome-platform-administration/page/administer/reference-pages/task/schedule-report.html
Generate and distribute scheduled reports via email.
BDE is right

Selected Answer: BDE
Simple

B. Can be a graphical representation of data: Reports in ServiceNow can include various graphical representations, such as charts and graphs, to provide visual insights into the data.

D. Can be run on demand by authorized users: Authorized users can generate reports on-demand to view real-time data or specific information from the ServiceNow instance.

E. Can be scheduled to be run and distributed by email: ServiceNow allows users to schedule reports to run at specific times and automatically distribute the results via email. This feature is useful for regular reporting and sharing information with stakeholders.
BDE is correct

Selected Answer: BDE
BDE is correct. A is absolutely wrong

Selected Answer: BDE
B, D and A are the correct answers.
BDE is correct answer in Utah

Selected Answer: BDE
User without authorization to see some tables, cannot see the report
BDE should be the answer

Selected Answer: BDE
BDE is my answer

Selected Answer: BDE
BDE is correct.
BDE is valid in San Diego

Selected Answer: BDE
yes BDE is correct according to docs.servicenow
VALID IS BDE
